column1: Art Institute of Chicago////If art's purpose is to evoke an emotional response
column2: then the contemporary art exhibit is the epitome of great art. My fiance was extraordinarily angry at how a red plank leaning against the wall was considered a minimalist masterpiece that bridged the physical world (the floor) and the imagination (the wall). I am not joking. Never has a plank of any sort evoked such a passionate response in him. Art.
